author.bio_html:
Howdy! 🌻🐤 ~retrofire.ink~ 🎨🔥

limited [only] by your skill and imagination

body:
I love you Britney! #FreeBritney

But... anyway, typically because of [hierarchy](https://i.redd.it/3kvxkl220t501.jpg) structures. Capitalism is inherently plagued with inequality. While the market is "free", this paradoxically results in the average citizen being less free, by virtue of inequality. Wealth naturally pools in the upper echelons of the pyramid aka "capitalists", who perform objectively less labor, while the average citizen is the brawn of their production. Corporations inevitably garner more and more political power. Oftentimes this can result in entire governments being controlled by the largest corporations (oligarchies). Capitalism promotes anti-competitive practices. And actively encourages the exploitation of the working class. Not to suggest I have a better solution (atm), but these are all cited as common critiques of capitalism.
body_html:

Wealth naturally pools in the upper echelons of the pyramid aka "capitalists", who perform objectively less labor, while the average citizen is the brawn of their production. Corporations inevitably garner more and more political power. Oftentimes this can result in entire governments being controlled by the largest corporations (oligarchies). Capitalism promotes anti-competitive practices. And actively encourages the exploitation of the working class. Not to suggest I have a better solution (atm), but these are all cited as common critiques of capitalism.
